org.daisy.pipeline.job

Class AbstractJobContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.job.AbstractJobContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobContext

    public abstract class AbstractJobContext
extends Object
implements JobContext
    This class defines the common behaviour to jobs contexts, the context will mainly differ depending on the mode of the WS, local or remote. The subclasses of JobContext MUST define some fine grained behaviour regarding how the job interacts with the fs and input,output,option redirections.
